summary:
Amsterdam is the capital and largest city in the Netherlands. It started as a small fishing village in the 12th century and became a powerful trading port during the 17th century. Known for its canals, art, and open-minded culture, it's often called the "Venice of the North." The city has many famous attractions, like the Rijksmuseum and Anne Frank House. 

Amsterdam is also an important business and tech hub, with many big companies based there. It's a popular tourist destination due to its historic architecture and lively festivals. The city is home to people from over 180 nationalities, making it one of the world's most multicultural cities.
title: Amsterdam
